intro: Geissorhiza nubigena, commonly known as the cloudland geissorhiza, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Iridaceae family and is characterized by its striking, showy inflorescences. The plant produces bright yellow to orange flowers that bloom in late summer, attracting various pollinators. It typically grows in rocky, well-drained soils and prefers full sun to partial shade. Due to its ornamental value and unique appearance, it is often cultivated in gardens and botanical collections.
